data.title: Comedy Dynamics Will Release 10 Comedy Specials Filmed at Tribeca Film Fest
data.meta_description: Last summer, ten comedy specials were filmed at the Tribeca Film Festival in partnership with Comedy Dynamics, and they'll be dropping them all on video on
data.text:
Last summer, ten comedy specials were filmed at the Tribeca Film Festival in partnership with Comedy Dynamics, and they’ll be dropping them all on video on demand platforms all summer long. All ten specials were directed by Brian Volk Weiss.

Among the performers are acclaimed actor and Def Comedy Jam veteran Bill Bellamy, Emmy nominated writer Josh Gondelman who you know from Desus and Mero and Last Week Tonight and his fabulous book Nice Try, national headliner Jackie Fabulous who crushed on Americas Got Talent in 2019, comedian actress and podcaster Helen Hong, and NYC Drag Queen and social media sensation Miz Cracker. Also Steve Michael Quezada who you know best from his role on Breaking Bad, comedian and podcaster Katrina Davis, actress and comedian Cocoa Brown, up and coming Kellen Erskine whose been making all the “who to watch” lists, and fresh and funny comic to watch Maija DiGrigorio, will all debut specials this summer.

Josh Gondelman: People Pleaser

Bill Bellamy: I Want My Life Back

Helen Hong: Well Hong

Cocoa Brown: Famous Enough

Maija DiGiorgio: Maija! Maija! Maija!

Jackie Fabulous: Menoplause

Steven Michael Quezada: The New Mexican

Miz Cracker: Here I Stand

Katrina Davis: Figuring It Out

Kellen Erskine: Zoomed Out

Comedy Dynamics, the world’s largest independent stand-up comedy production company will release the specials digitally through their hybrid distribution network consisting of Amazon Prime Video, Apple TV, Spectrum, YouTube, and more starting May 24th. The albums will be released on Apple Music, Amazon Music, Spotify, Pandora and more for streaming and purchase starting May 27th.
